featured.text: Due to the yearly bonus system, the 100 ________ positions in this high-tech company have attracted many applicants from around the island.

definition.zh_def: 額外的獎勵或獎金，通常是基於表現或成就的獎勵。
definition.en_def: An extra payment or reward given for good performance or achievement.
definition.example: She received a bonus for exceeding her sales targets this quarter.
